alert.note: Alert for Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:20PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Thunderstorms and heavy rain will impact portions of Yolo, southeastern Sutter, central Sacramento, north central San Joaquin, northeastern Solano and southwestern Placer Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 418 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking some thunderstorms near Liberty Farms, or 11 miles south of Davis, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sacramento, Elk Grove, Davis, Woodland, Galt, Rumsey, Carmichael, Rancho Cordova, West Sacramento, Dixon, Winters, Paintersville, Franklin, Dunnigan, Tancred, Laguna, Zamora, Rio Linda, Vineyard and Brooks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carquinez Strait and Delta; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley
